get_rucs: SELECT * FROM minprod.safest_relaciones WHERE FISCALIA = 'REG. M. CENTRO NORTE' AND rownum < 10000

query_info.name: get_relato
query_info.query: select distinct r.ruc, h.crr_idhecho, regexp_replace(h.gls_hecho, '[[:cntrl:]]', '') as relato from minprod.safest_relaciones r inner join minprod.trec_hechodoc h on (h.crr_caso = r.idcaso) where r.ruc in ({RUCS_VALUE}) order by r.ruc, h.crr_idhecho asc

query_info.name: get_codigo_delito
query_info.query: SELECT COD_DELITO FROM minprod.safest_relaciones WHERE FISCALIA = 'REG. M. CENTRO NORTE' AND RUC IN ({RUCS_VALUE}) AND rownum < 10000
